title: DRM L3 stuck on my pixel 3 XL
content: Hello, I got my pixel 3 XL two days ago and I flashed my device with the Google flash tool (web browser) and now I'm seeing widevine security level L3, therefore I can't watch Netflix video's on HD. Any way to fix this? I have never used any room or kernel stuff, locked the bootloader after flashing and disabled developer mode.
